alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 12:28AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Yalobusha and northwestern Calhoun Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1228 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scobey, or 10 miles north of Grenada, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bruce, Coffeeville, Pittsboro, Banner, Spearman, Bryant, Benwood, Bounds, Pine Valley, Ellard, Shepherd, Skuna, Tyson, Gums and Retreat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
